reviews.title: Nice decoration but...
Nightmare stay ever have!
reviews.text: Upon checking in they take rm2000 as deposit, which is fine and practiced by other hotels. However, upon checking out after making full payments, the staff at the counter assured me that the initial deposit would be automatically cancelled once full payment have been tendered. I asked for the visa slip to show the cancellation of the deposit but was told none would be provided and that cancellation is automatically done once full payment was made. After 3 days a check with my credit card shows that the deposit amount is still being held by legoland Malaysia hotel. Called the credit card company and was told that only the merchant can cancel the held amount otherwise I've to wait up to 10 days before they return that amountf if no claims are made towards.it by the merchant. A call to the hotel was equally futile as the manager proceeded to tell me that it's normal and that the amount would be returned by the bank automatically.

Advise to all...either put up the deposit by cash or vehemently ask to see the cancellation slip when u are checking out. Pls sort this silly operation procedure out. Till now it's day 10 and I'm still seeing the rm2000 being held.
reviews.title: Expected more for the price paid.
Two days stay.
reviews.text: Since it was just barely a month before it was opened, we decided to book a room to stay over, and visit the Legoland the following day. I was wowed by the decoration in the lobby, but not impressed by the long wait of the check-in. I was wowed by the (Kingdom theme) room size and decoration, but not impressed that there was no amenities in the room. I was wowed by overall decoration and the little lego figures in the room, but not impressed that we were facing a construction site totally with no view and boring. By the time we checked-in, we can't even go to the pool as it was closed by 6pm.

We already heard about the issues on the checking in for the hotel, and thus decided to stay over at Traders Hotel Puteri Harbour for the first night instead. It was a wise choice, as we heard many complained their rooms were not ready even at 4pm when the check out was supposed to be at 10am..
reviews.title: Still Not There Yet
